import React from "react"; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import {Redirect} from "react-router-dom"; class Registration extends React.Component{ constructor(props) { super(props); this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); this.errorMessage = ''; this.state = { redirect:false, accountname:"", displayname:"", phonenumber:"", email:"", zipcode:"", dob:"", password1:"", password2:"", userId:"" } } handleSubmit(e){ e.preventDefault(); this.user = document.getElementById("name_field").value this.setState({userId:this.user}) if(this.errorMessage === ''){ this.setState({redirect:true}); } //this.setState({redirect:true}) } render(){ if(this.state.redirect){ return( ) } return(
Register
{(this.errorMessage=== '')?

:''}
) } } export default connect()(Registration)
